Title: Children of Earth, Day Four
Plot: Torchwood finally learns the truth about the events of 1965. But Britain is in danger of becoming a rogue state, and everything now pivots around John Frobisher, as the Ambassador of the 456 destroys its old allegiances and reveals its true intent.
GuestStars: Kai Owen, Peter Capaldi, Paul Copley, Nicholas Farrell, Susan Brown, Lucy Cohu, Cush Jumbo, Liz May Brice, Ian Gelder, Colin McFarlane, Deborah Findlay, Nicholas Briggs, Patric Naiambana, Tom Price, Charles Abomeli
